---
name: Technical Details
about: Track technical implementation for extracurricular activities platform
labels: enhancement
---

## Features
- Demo data
- Validation
- Backend integration
- Animations

### Description
Implement and improve technical aspects of the platform to ensure reliability and maintainability.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Demo data is available for testing
- Input validation is robust
- Backend integration is complete and secure
- Animations are implemented efficiently
